name: arcibi
text: Silly Lyle, there's never anything good on TV in the early afternoon

name: ambala
text: I think I would actually watch the last one.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by FuckYou, ButterMoths, Dezufnocosem, rowboat, farqussus, godfatherofsouls, lux, nutmeg, domini, dr_sexlove)

name: radarjammer
text: I know it's horribly wrong but I chubbed this so hard.

name: dusty
text: ...Join us next time, when we meet the 10 people who took this comment personally, and introduce them to an amazing medical professional who says he may have a way to pull the sticks out of their asses.

name: nexus
text: A comment left by nexus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by FuckYou, joeyramoney, ralgnar)

name: dejavroom
text: I only wish there were more opportunities to use "slurp [oneself] free" in real life.

name: dri-ft
text:
WAIT,

I gave that a chubby, but only because I initially read it as "I only wish there were more opportunities to slurp onesself free in real life".

name: philosophe
text: hey me too!

name: shutup_shutup
text: wow, it took me like five reads through to realize that it didn't say that.  Thanks eyes.  Theyes.

name: thegoblins
text: thants!

name: i_love_kate
text: omg i love u both <3

name: thegoblins
text: omg 3sum <3

name: tommycrashwreck
text: Years later, historians would still be trying to unslurp the tangled mystery of why dejavroom didn't just write "I only wish there were more opportunities to slurp oneself free in real life" in the first place.

name: dacapn
text: forreal its jjust a typa waths teh bgi dlea

name: atilla
text: Because when editing a quote, you put the edit in brackets. Initially it was "himself" which was changed to oneself, and thus requires brackets.

name: deancain29
text: genius

name: nessotron
text: Maybe it's from living in the UK, with all the "LOL fattest man alive" and other such shows, but this is frighteningly similar to real-life television.

name: i_love_kate
text:
Is that an excuse to do the same joke as a Loserz strip, Mr. Onstad?

(You do not need an excuse.)

name: cdl146
text: Alt text: whatever. It was late and a friend was over.

name: hendetta
text: A comment left by hendetta was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tttt, farqussus, howl, crumpetsandtea)

name: rowboat
text: Not the first, but close. Anyway, I love that the whole alt text phenomenon seems to have been born from Onstad's need to sort of apologize for strips that were obviously just thrown together.

name: zzzleepy
text: but its the first time before it's used consistently thereafter, right?

name: jollysaintpete
text: a chubby for being correct

name: closefriend
text: This is the Internet's chief strength, that it is not beholden to a schedule. Any time you want to know about Donny Osmond's turn-ons or what fat losers think of your favorite band, there it is waiting for you.

name: greymantledwolf
text: i like that he actually gets angry. tv makes me angry too.

name: idsyen
text: Even better is how he gamely checks the next station, fully expecting it to provide him with an edifying viewing experience.

name: _cheesekayke
text: First alt text except for the bonus strip a while back.

name: cailetshadow
text: The last panel is Lyle clicking furiously, as though the more he clicks, the further away he gets from that last show.

name: orvel
text:
There's never anything to scratch your balls to on daytime television.

Except maybe The View.

name: puguglypress
text: I wish I had the tools to make a Photoshop reply to this. It would have that panel where Todd does cocaine while pointing at Ray, except that he would be scratching his balls while pointing at the TV. Inside the TV would be a cut-and-pasted picture of the ladies from The View.

name: snowman
text: This strip is way better than the alt text would suggest.

name: i_love_kate
text: I wonder if there's any way for it to be twice as off.

name: hamscout
text:
Looks like somebody spent half a sick day trying to find good daytime TV...

Bring back the original People's Court!

name: farqussus
text: Lyle's biceps are rippin

name: em2
text: This is usually what I do on New Year's Day. I always sleep past the damn Rose Parade. Not like that's worth watching.

name: gigs
text: This strip is twice as great before you realize those are three separate shows.

name: desert_donkey
text: tv is trash. SHOOT YOUR TV!
